attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the coalition, call emergency re- election
attributes.additional_details:
I am aware a lot of people aren't into politics but this really matters to everyone in the UK and it is vital your signature is on here

Is anyone else getting a sense of déjà vu with this government?

Privatization

Riots

Strikes

Cuts deep enough to scar being made too fast

45p top rate tax which will only benefit millionaires tax

Nothing in the Budget to help families with rising fuel prices

Nothing to help young people who are out of work

Freeze on age related allowances for pensioners was a "hidden" tax increase

This was pointed out in Ed Milliband's speech and was George Obsbourne's expression one of laughter at these claims?
No
It was right on the money

Obviously if you're not a millionaire you don't matter to this government and that is dangerous to the majority.

Enough is enough, time for a vote of no confidence in the government and an emergency election.

Wrong choices, wrong priorities, wrong values, out of touch. Same old Tories.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament and not the Government. There is already a petition calling for the Government to resign and one calling for a general election.
